Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object

        The aggregate skill of the entire team

      • getTeamSkill

        public int getTeamSkill()
        Returns:

      • verifyValidity

        public boolean verifyValidity(java.lang.String raceType)
        To check validity of team
        Parameters:
        raceType - Type of race : "TwoWheeler" or "FourWheeler"
        Returns:
        Return true if Team is valid, else return false

      • calculateTeamSkill

        public void calculateTeamSkill()
        Calculate teamSkill as teamSkill = (5*driver's Skill + 2*crew member's Skill)
